bibl.title: A Christian Homily.
bibl.note: Provenance unknown, VI or VII A.D.? The verso bears an Arabic private letter (IX A.D.).

bibl.title: Proceedings of the International Congress Palestine in the Light of Papyri and Inscriptions, 5-9 September 1998. I

Alia HANAFI (Ed.), Proceedings of the International Congress Palestine in the Light of Papyri and Inscriptions, 5-9 September 1998. I (Cairo, 2000) pp. 101-114 et 1 pl.
Provenance unknown, VI or VII A.D.? The verso bears an Arabic private letter (IX A.D.).
